name: FruityMartial
description:
Can you conquer the world of fruits master chief?

Chief: Yes!indeed

We shall see it!

This games provide you an experience of the life of a kitchen chief you have different modes to play:

1.Sandbox:A game mode in which you have unlimited time to play.

2.10sec:A game mode in which you have 10 sec to score .

3.danger:A game mode in which you have to do not let your fruits and vegs touch the danger line

How to play:

Playing the game is simple you can play this game by just left clicking.

-
